Creating the Complete Retail
Solution = Commerce, OMS and IIB
February 16th, 2016 (Tuesday) at 01:00 PM EST
Register Now
 
WEBINARS Check out our Webinar Depot for latest updates | Check it Out!!
 
 
Is it enough to have a Brick and Mortar Store for retailers today? In a Digital Economy driven by customer, Retailers are striving hard to provide personalized and connected Omni-Channel Experiences to customer's every day. To achieve this Omni-channel goal, retailers need to have their Order Management Systems and Commerce Store integrate seamlessly along with the Digital Applications which are customer facing.
 
How can retailers achieve such a solution? Join us on February 16th, 2016 (Tuesday) at 01:00 PM EST, as our Commerce experts showcase how you can use IBM Integration Bus (ESB) to integrate IBM WebSphere Commerce with Sterling Order Management for Inventory, Ordering, Pricing and Promotions. Using these technologies, retailers can provide a connected and consistent experience to their customers across all channels.
